name: Cat-A-Combs!
description:
Cats have multiple lives I reckoned...

Venture through deadly chambers to find your way out of this insane catacomb! 

See you on the other side...

Cat-A-Combs! is a puzzle plataformer made with Godot for the GameDev.tv 2022 Game Jam.

Source on GitHub

Created by: Audrey Vasconcelos | Fernando Silveira | JP Durigan | Lia Godoy

Audio assets

"The Moonpool Instrumental" music by David-Gwyn Jones Royalty 

"Take it all in" music from Zapsplat

"Ambience Cave 00" by Little Robot Sound Factory

Sound effects from Zapsplat and Freesound

Fonts

"Pirata One" by Rodrigo Fuenzalida and Nicolas Massi 

"Gothic Pixel" by SparklyDest 

"Kenney Pixel" by Kenney 

"Press Start 2P" by CodeMan38
